AttributeDefinition.name: ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: unique identifier of an account

AttributeDefinition.name: firstName
AttributeDefinition.Description: first name for the personnel.

AttributeDefinition.name: lastName
AttributeDefinition.Description: last name (surname) for the personnel.

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: display name for the personnel.

AttributeDefinition.name: middleName
AttributeDefinition.Description: the middle name for the personnel.

AttributeDefinition.name: suffix
AttributeDefinition.Description: the suffix (or list of suffixes) for the personnel.

AttributeDefinition.name: privilege
AttributeDefinition.Description: the privileges assigned to the personnel

AttributeDefinition.name: birthdate
AttributeDefinition.Description: the date/time of birth for the personnel.

AttributeDefinition.name: gender
AttributeDefinition.Description: the gender of the personnel.

AttributeDefinition.name: username
AttributeDefinition.Description: the user name associated with the account. The value of the user name field must be unique within the system.

AttributeDefinition.name: directoryIndicator
AttributeDefinition.Description: It contains an indicator of whether or not the user is an LDAP directory user.

AttributeDefinition.name: restriction
AttributeDefinition.Description: the restrictions given to an account.

AttributeDefinition.name: title
AttributeDefinition.Description: the title (or list of titles) for the personnel, Dr. Mr. etc

AttributeDefinition.name: physicianInd
AttributeDefinition.Description: an indicator of whether or not the personnel is a physician

AttributeDefinition.name: position
AttributeDefinition.Description: the position assigned to the personnel.

AttributeDefinition.name: beginEffectiveDateTime
AttributeDefinition.Description: the date/time at which the personnel becomes/became effective

AttributeDefinition.name: endEffectiveDateTime
AttributeDefinition.Description: the date/time at which the personnel ceases/ceased to be effective.

AttributeDefinition.name: organizationGroup
AttributeDefinition.Description: organization groups associated to the personnel

AttributeDefinition.name: confidentialityLevel
AttributeDefinition.Description: the confidentiality level that applies to the relationship with organization

AttributeDefinition.name: personnelAlias
AttributeDefinition.Description: It contains personnel alias information

AttributeDefinition.name: credential
AttributeDefinition.Description: It contains personnel credential information

AttributeDefinition.name: address
AttributeDefinition.Description: the personnel addresses information

AttributeDefinition.name: organization
AttributeDefinition.Description: the list of organizations assigned to the user

AttributeDefinition.name: personnelGroup
AttributeDefinition.Description: the personnel groups assigned to an account.

AttributeDefinition.name: ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: unique identifier of a group

AttributeDefinition.name: display
AttributeDefinition.Description: display value of a group
